BGsmartR

The goal of BGsmartR is to enrich living collections records and create reports and analysis’ of collections.

Installation

You can install the development version of BGsmartR from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Jake-Powell/BGsmartR")
